entry.title: Brain Really Uses Quantum Effects, New Study Finds

media:group.media:description:
Start speaking a new language in 3 weeks with Babbel ğŸ‰. Get up to 60% OFF your subscription â¡Here: https://bit.ly/sabinebabbel05
When Roger Penrose originally came out with the idea that the human brain uses quantum effects in microtubules and that was the origin of consciousness, many thought the idea was a little crazy. According to a new study, it turns out that Penrose was actually rightâ€¦ about the microtubules anyways. Letâ€™s have a look.

entry.title: CERN Looks for Origins of Quantum Randomness

media:group.media:title: CERN Looks for Origins of Quantum Randomness
media:group.media:description:
Learn more about quantum mechanics from my course on Brilliant! First 30 days are free and 20% off the annual premium subscription when you use our link âœ https://brilliant.org/sabine.
Particle physics have conducted a test using data from the Large Hadron Collider at CERN to see if the particles in their collisions play by the rules of quantum physics - whether they have quantum entanglement. Why was this test conducted when previous tests already found that entanglement is real? Is it just nonsense or is it not nonsense? Letâ€™s have a look.
Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2311.07288

entry.title: Bird Flu Spreads to Dairy Cattle, Farm Worker Infected, Virus Fragments in Milk

media:group.media:title: Bird Flu Spreads to Dairy Cattle, Farm Worker Infected, Virus Fragments in Milk
media:group.media:description:
Enjoy 10% OFF on all Hoverpens and free shipping to most countries with code SABINE: North America & other countries: https://bit.ly/sabine_novium UK & Europe: https://bit.ly/sabine_noviumeu
The bird flu has spread to cattle in the United States. Inactive fragments of the virus have been found in milk. The World Health Organization rates the current risk for humans as low but epidemiologists all over the world are on high alert. I have the summary.
The WHO evaluation is here: https://cdn.who.int/media/docs/default-source/global-influenza-programme/2024_04_23_fao-woah-who_h5n1_assessment.pdf
The paper about the farm worker is here: https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMc2405371

entry.title: The Multiverse just Got Bigger: An Upgrade for the Many Worlds Interpretation

media:group.media:title: The Multiverse just Got Bigger: An Upgrade for the Many Worlds Interpretation
media:group.media:description:
Check out my course on quantum mechanics on Brilliant! First 30 days are free and 20% off the annual premium subscription when you use our link âœ https://brilliant.org/sabine.
The idea of parallel universes is both crazy and not. In physics, it's prominently represented by the â€œMany Worldsâ€ interpretation of quantum mechanics. A group of physicists now says that the many worlds interpretation contains many more worlds than we thought so far, meaning the infinite number of multiverses could be infinitely larger. Letâ€™s have a look.
Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2403.10895

entry.title: Fusion in Space: New Plasma Thruster Tested Successfully

media:group.media:title: Fusion in Space: New Plasma Thruster Tested Successfully
media:group.media:description:
Try Opera browser FOR FREE here https://opr.as/eiiu-sabine-hossenfelder
Last week I saw a lot of headlines about a space propulsion system that uses nuclear fusion. The news comes from a company by name RocketStar Inc. which announced in a press release that they have â€œreinventedâ€ spacecraft by releasing the â€œworldâ€™s first fusion-enhanced space thruster, the FireStarâ„¢ Fusion Drive. They claim that the FireStar TM Fusion Drive improves their water powered pulsed plasma thruster by harnessing aneutronic nuclear fusion by 50%. In this video I explain what this all means.

entry.title: New Experiment Could Settle 100 Years-Old Debate about Quantum Tunneling

media:group.media:title: New Experiment Could Settle 100 Years-Old Debate about Quantum Tunneling
media:group.media:description:
ğŸ’°Special Offer!ğŸ’° Use our link https://joinnautilus.com/SABINE to get 15% off your membership!
Quantum Tunnelling is a fascinating process in which a particle goes through a barrier faster than the speed of light. At least thatâ€™s what some physicists think. Others say this is just a wrong interpretation of what is really going on. This debate has been going on for a century, but a new experiment could finally end the debate once and for all. Letâ€™s have a look.
Paper: https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/sciadv.adl6078
